p: Compounds were tentatively identified using the Metabolomics workbench [ 17]. The database was searched, using the m/z mass obtained from total ion chromatograms, with parameters set to the negative [M-H] − and positive ion [M + H] + mode, respectively, and a mass tolerance of ± 0.5 m/z. Tentative identification was based on the experimental mass of the specific peaks compared to literature and was carried out in conjunction with independent metabolite repositories, Metabolomics Workbench, PubChem, and METLIN Metabolite and Chemical Entity Database.
